author: schor
msg: no Jira - change bundle plugin back to 2.3.7 (from 2.5.0) because 2.5.0 is signalling an error on the uimaj-ep-runtime build, saying there's some class in org.apache.uima.cas.impl which has a reference to a symbol (or maybe to some other thing, which in turn, has reference to a symbol) in the "default" package, which isn't allowed by OSGi.
